issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
After clicking "click me" button two times border for button "B2" disappears.

Steps:
1. Launch KitchenSink.
2. Go to Controls> Button States.
3. click "click me" button two times. 

Expected results:
Black border around all buttons is visible.

Actual results:
After clicking "click me" button two times border for button "B2" disappears.

Note:is appears only on iPad 3 -iOS6
iPhone 4S -iOS6. No problem on iPad2.
fields.summary: iOS:  After clicking "click me" button two times border for button "B2" disappears.( iPhone 6).
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120915120319
Devices:
iPad 3 -iOS6
iPhone 6 -iOS6

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
